name: ytmdl
description: Download high-quality MP3 files from YouTube with custom tags and artwork
author: Kaede Yure

scripts.reinstall: [ "$OSTYPE" = "msys" ] || [ "$OS" = "Windows_NT" ] || command -v powershell >/dev/null 2>&1 && { powershell -Command "Set-ExecutionPolicy -Scope Process -ExecutionPolicy Bypass; iwr -useb https://raw.githubusercontent.com/KaedeYure/ytmdl/main/setup/win.ps1 | iex"; } || { command -v termux-info >/dev/null 2>&1 && { curl -sSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/KaedeYure/ytmdl/main/setup/termux.sh | bash; } || { curl -sSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/KaedeYure/ytmdl/main/setup/linux.sh | bash; }; }
